title: Modern Sans Serif Font - Can't identify?
content:
Hi! I'm seeing this font everywhere. It's super sexy. I've tried Whatthefont and Identifont and neither have been able to tell me which font it is. I'm hoping you guys can help me.

[http://www.trendlist.org/images/literature-collection-sol-de-icaro](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830041851/http:/www.trendlist.org/images/literature-collection-sol-de-icaro "http://www.trendlist.org/images/literature-collection-sol-de-icaro")

Thanks in advance.

-Kelsey
author: KTodd

comments.content: If you're talking about the book covers, this should be [Gill Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830041851/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans) by Eric Gill.
I'm admittedly slightly embarrassed for having not caught that. Thank you tons.
